EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 110 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Daniel, I just spoke with him. He is going to call you to ensure you want to use our program and if so, he said he will work on a contract with us. I also let him know we would be happy to work with their agreement if he was more comfortable with that. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Daniel Buchanan [mailto:dbuchanan12@ymail.com] Sent: Monday, April 30, 2012 7:30 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Intratek Computer, Inc_Daniel Buchanan_MBO Agreement Hi Sara, At this point, it may be helpful for you to reach out to him by phone and see if you can help clarify MBO Partners' role in this contract. I'm not exactly sure why there is confusion over this, or why Bahi is holding up my contract work over my insurance coverage that is being handled on my end and does not impact his business or the assigned work in any way, but I will continue to try to track him down for an answer. Please let me know if you have any luck reaching him. Thanks,Daniel Buchanan (p) 321-821-7518 (e) dbuchanan12@ymail.comFrom: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:dbuchanan12@ymail.com>> To: Daniel Buchanan <dbuchanan12@ymail.com <mailto:dbuchanan12@ymail.com>> Sent: Monday, April 30, 2012 7:21 PM Subject: RE: Intratek Computer, Inc_Daniel Buchanan_MBO Agreement Hi Daniel, Sounds good. Let me know if you would like me to reach out via phone  perhaps that will help with the confusion. Thanks,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Daniel Buchanan [mailto:dbuchanan12@ymail.com] <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Sent: Monday, April 30, 2012 11:59 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Intratek Computer, Inc_Daniel Buchanan_MBO Agreement Hi Sara, Thank you for following up. I've received one email back from Bahi since your introduction to MBO Partners' suite of services, which he didn't seem to have a clear understanding of. I sent him a couple of emails last week in response, reiterating the information from your email and explaining how I would be utilizing your services for insurance coverage and benefits throughout the term of my contract with Intratek Computer. Unfortunately, I still haven't received a reply from him and have had no luck tracking him down by phone. I will continue to try connecting with him today and keep you posted. Kind regards,Daniel Buchanan (p) 321-821-7518 (e) dbuchanan12@ymail.comFrom: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:dbuchanan12@ymail.com>> To: Daniel Buchanan <dbuchanan12@ymail.com <mailto:dbuchanan12@ymail.com>> Sent: Monday, April 30, 2012 11:20 AM Subject: RE: Intratek Computer, Inc_Daniel Buchanan_MBO Agreement Hi Daniel, Did you hear anything back? Thanks,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. From: Daniel Buchanan [mailto:dbuchanan12@ymail.com] <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Sent: Thursday, April 26, 2012 3:46 PM To: Bahi Ghobbeh Cc: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Intratek Computer, Inc_Daniel Buchanan_MBO Agreement Hi Bahi, I hope all is well. I'm touching base to make sure you received this correspondence from Sara Conde in regards to my insurance certification. Please let us know if you have any questions. I look forward to working with you and the rest of the Intratek team soon! Kind regards,Daniel Buchanan (p) 321-821-7518 (e) dbuchanan12@ymail.com <mailto:dbuchanan12@ymail.com>----- Forwarded Message ----- From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> To: "bghobbeh@intrapc.com" <bghobbeh@intrapc.com <mailto:bghobbeh@intrapc.com>> Cc: "Daniel Buchanan (dbuchanan12@ymail.com)" <dbuchanan12@ymail.com <mailto:dbuchanan12@ymail.com>> Sent: Wednesday, April 25, 2012 2:24 PM Subject: Intratek Computer, Inc_Daniel Buchanan_MBO Agreement Dear Bahi , My name is Sara and I am a Consultant Services Advisor at MBO Partners. Your name was forwarded to me by Daniel Buchanan. On behalf of everyone here at MBO Partners, we look forward to working with your firm. MBO Partners caters to two markets. Our first service is designed for independent consultants and small businsses who choose to plug into our MBO Services Cloud to make it easier for them to work with their clients. We take care of all the back office administrative, HR, regulatory and financial issues so they can stay focused on delivering on their services. The second is how we help enterprise organizations engage more efficently and safely with their contract workforce. We have also put together a short one page collateral that explains how we work and the markets we serve. Attached is the standard agreement and statement of work we use when engaging our Associates with their clients. Please review and complete it, and return a signed copy to me. And, please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions. Thanks again, and I look forward to working with you. Best regards,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
